chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 mini has the above problem: Good day, I got a message from DHL today that my house number is missing, although I've entered my full address here. Thank you for your help,

Hello, 

the correct address is:

Martin Mayrhofer
Karling 72
4081 Hartkirchen
Österreich

You can send the parcel to this address.

Thank you very much.

Yours sincerely,
Kubra, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the updated address and will inform our logistics partner. 

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The device has been delivered to the customer according to the tracking link provided. If the customer does not require any further assistance, please close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
